CustomField.description: What: Used in Reporting for Open vs Closed Opptys
CustomField.formula:
IMAGE('http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=p3&chs=300x100&chd=t:'+ TEXT( SDO_Sales_Open_Opptys__c ) + ',' + TEXT(SDO_Sales_Closed_Lost_Opptys__c + SDO_Sales_Closed_Won_Opptys__c) + '&chl=Open (' + TEXT(SDO_Sales_Open_Opptys__c)+')|Closed ('+TEXT( SDO_Sales_Closed_Lost_Opptys__c + SDO_Sales_Closed_Won_Opptys__c )+')&chf=bg,s,FFFFFF'
, 'no data available')
CustomField.label: Open vs. Closed Opportunities
